bioconda.name: mquad
bioconda.summary: MQuad: Mixture Model for Mitochondrial Mutation detection in single-cell omics data.

biotools.summary: MQuad (Mixture Model for Mitochondrial Mutation detection in single-cell omics data) is a tool that detects mitochondrial mutations that are informative for clonal substructure inference. MQuad enables clonal substructure discovery using single cell mitochondrial variants. It uses a binomial mixture model to assess the heteroplasmy of mtDNA variants among background noise.

bioschemas.name: MQuad
bioschemas.summary: MQuad (Mixture Model for Mitochondrial Mutation detection in single-cell omics data) is a tool that detects mitochondrial mutations that are informative for clonal substructure inference.
